scripts.minify: npm run minify:clean && npm run minify:media && npm run minify:images && npm run minify:svg
scripts.minify:images: cp -r src/assets/images assets/images && find assets/images -type f \( -iname '*.jpg' -o -iname '*.jpeg' -o -iname '*.png' \) -exec magick {} -strip -quality 100 {} \;
scripts.minify:media: cp -r src/media media && find media -type f \( -iname '*.jpg' -o -iname '*.jpeg' -o -iname '*.png' \) -exec magick {} -strip -quality 100 {} \;
